next_questions.title: Hello Traveller!
next_questions.description:
The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy survey

And all dared to brave unknown terrors, to do mighty deeds, to boldly split infinitives that no man had split before--and thus was the Empire forged.

survey.message: <q>If there's anything more important than my ego around, I want it caught and shot now.</q>

next_questions.name: q8
next_questions.title: Q8
next_questions.description: During an average day, when are you inside an SEP field. (Typically work hours). An SEP is something we can't see, or don't see, or our brain doesn't let us see, because we think that it's somebody else's problem. That’s what SEP means. Somebody Else’s Problem. The brain just edits it out, it's like a blind spot.

survey.message: So long, and thanks for all the fish.
